text: Big Daddy is a 1999 American comedy movie directed by Dennis Dugan and written by Steve Franks, Tim Herlihy and Adam Sandler. It stars Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart, Rob Schneider, and Leslie Mann. It was released on June 25, 1999. The movie was Sandler's highest-grosser domestically until Hotel Transylvania 2 (2015). ==References== Category:1999 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Dennis Dugan Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Big Daddy (1999 movie)
